html:
5.1.20  3:02 pm   what should i be for halloween

      a horse

5.1.20  2:46 pm   I have so many vague ideas for songwriting but I can't channel them into actual creative steps. How do I take that leap from vague ideas to actual action?

      try doing it with very small ideas first. if it's still not working, try with even smaller ideas

5.1.20  2:42 pm   Do you prefer to use a clipboard or a notepad when you write lyrics

      i used a binder when i was working with paper, but ever since about 2011 i mostly work digitally. also don't forget, the lyrics are never written without music being written also, at the same time. even when it's just on the page. it would be staff paper

5.1.20  2:36 pm   is new hampshire new?

     put it this way, it's newer than hampshire

      or is it just called that to get more people to live there?

     it's called that to remind them of the old hampshire, whilst not causing too much confusion

5.1.20  2:31 pm   How do you write songs like you do?

      i am trying to figure out

5.1.20  2:09 pm   Any words of wisdom?

      yes. wisdom usually rains words, plentifully

5.1.20  2:03 pm   whats your favorite type of clock

      the sun

5.1.20  1:58 pm   whats the most effective way i can ask you to make another song

      that makes no difference. the question is what's the most effective way i can make them

5.1.20  1:45 pm   What's your favorite sport?

      what's the one where you have to try to get the other team to lose

5.1.20  1:21 pm   whats the best thing anyone could do

      there is no limit to how good a thing anyone can do

5.1.20  1:05 pm   do you think time is real?

      oh man, that would explain a lot

5.1.20  12:29 pm   Has there ever been a combination of words that just knocked your socks off?

     of course

     What were they?

      oh you are assuming this has only happened once or rarely

5.1.20  12:03 pm   what was the inspiration for "christmas isn't real?"

      songwriting

5.1.20  11:37 am   opinion on birds?

     it's got to be the female version of a bee

5.1.20  11:28 am   Why am I tall

      to see things from a different perspective

5.1.20  11:13 am   Do you draw all the covers of your songs on Youtube?

     yes

     Or do you not?

5.1.20  10:45 am   Where is old Zealand located

      in the netherlands

5.1.20  10:41 am   Why is Canada so cold?

      probably because it's so north

5.1.20  9:38 am   do you purposefully make jokes in your videos,

     absolutely not

      or do you just say whatever comes to mind and happen to be a funny person?

      you can't blame me for that. everything is funny. that is due to the big bang. must have been the angle it occured at

5.1.20  8:51 am   what is noodles

      like a stick but more relaxed

5.1.20  8:39 am   i remember that i made a song in a dream but i don't remember the song in detail

      you'll have to make more songs in dreams

5.1.20  8:27 am   any thoughts on art innovation?

      seems legit

5.1.20  7:40 am   HOW DARE YOU NOT USE CAPITALS?!!?

      me? how dare you not notice the never ending amount of capitals i do use. especially in videos but also in every other form of text

5.1.20  6:32 am   what is a sound that has not existed before now?

      only you can decide that

5.1.20  5:16 am   I don't know how to compose a song.

     me neither

     How do you compose a song?

      ultimately, it has to compose me. but i have an array of strategies i might use for tricking it into doing so. such as poking it and runing away. or pretending i'm not listening

5.1.20  4:05 am   Are you a Star Wars fan

      sometimes i wonder if there will ever be peace, in the stars

5.1.20  2:59 am   Why must we choose between corn dogs and hot dogs?

      guess you just haven't figured out how to put corn in a hotdog

5.1.20  2:33 am   Do you think there's a limit to what can be expressed through music?

      yes, but there is no limit to what can be enhanced by music

5.1.20  1:57 am   i was at the late nite lounge with Loud Lenny, but then I got angry. When was the last time you were Angry??

      when i was trying to find any possible way to automatically implement level of detail (lod) throughout particle systems

5.1.20  1:39 am   Please explain how the birds are made of trees

      that's a simple example of diagonal thinking

5.1.20  12:53 am   Is cereal a soup?

     no

     Why or why not?

      must have been some political rift

5.1.20  12:07 am   What is your favorite piece of art

     starry night

      and why?

      didn't expect the night to be so starry. gets me every time

      like soup. jump right in

      that's one of the best uses for a theater

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

      rolling hills

4.30.20  8:12 pm   whats the deal with airline food?

      it's kitchenless. food made without a kitchen. that's because there is no kitchen on an airplane. instead, wings

     that's not true. it's other people who ask the questions

     How's your sleep schedule?

      pretty good
